name: The Will Site UK
tag_list: will, wills, will-writing, make-a--will, will-making, solicitor-wills, uk, legal-will, last-will-and-testament, last-will
overview:
The Will Site UK offers a solicitor backed will writing service for residents of the United Kingdom to make a will online. This service includes actual solicitor review of your legal will who checks for errors. After being professionally reviewed, your last will and testament is printed, bound and delivered to you by first class post. Or for a small nominal additional fee you may opt to store your legal will for as long as you wish or for the remainder of your Lifetime at the National Probate Office.

In the event you are unfamiliar with a will writing service, The Will Site has a very credible reputation and are members of Society of Professional Will Writers. We guarantee your privacy and offer our online service as a means to allow many people an opportunity to put their minds at ease and affairs in order without the necessity of travel and expense associated with traditional solicitor services.

You may opt to edit, change or update your will as you deem necessary. The Will Site UK is one of the original online will writing services and our services are designed for most individuals. An initial online interview conducted will determine your suitably for will making online. In the event your situation demans actual solicitor services, we will inform you and refer you elsewhere.
